message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That's a great starting point. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $10,500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking of a higher price point. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10,800. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal.
